answers.answer: Interesting"People should not take CCZ to treat their hepatitis C until it has been demonstrated that CCZ can be used safely and effectively for that purpose," said study author T. Jake Liang, senior investigator at NIH's National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases.can-do-man posted about it a day ago.http://www.medhelp.org/posts/Hepatitis-C/Cheap-allergy-drug-may-be-effective-for-hepatitis-C/show/2538048
